title: How To Deal With A Partner Who's Always Working
summary: Co-working is a way of working that brings together people from different companies and industries in a shared space to exchange ideas and collaborate. Here are some tips for dealing with someone who is always working. Remember that your partner’s job can be stressful, and it's important for them to decompress when they come home. Set boundaries and don’t be a martyr, even if your partner is working a lot, you still have to do your fair share around the house and with the kids.
